author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
message: Happiness is as a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but which if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: He who experiences the unity of life sees his own Self in all beings, and all beings in his own Self, and looks on everything with an impartial eye.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: In the sky, there is no distinction of east and west; people create distinctions out of their own minds and then believe them to be true.
title: Thought of the day

author: Caroline Myss
message: You cannot change anything in your life with intention alone, which can become a watered-down, occasional hope that you'll get to tomorrow. Intention without action is useless.
title: Thought of the day
